original_text: And his affection for you is all the greater when he remembers that you were all obedient, receiving him with fear and trembling.
korean_text: 그가 너희 모든 사람들이 두려움과 떪으로 자기를 영접하여 순종한 것을 생각하고 너희를 향하여 그의 심정이 더욱 깊었으니

sentences.original_text: And his affection for you is all the greater
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 너희를 향한 애정은 더욱 커진다

sentences.original_text: receiving him with fear and trembling
